title: The Lean Startup
description: A methodology for developing businesses and products based on validated learning.

author.biography: Eric Ries is an entrepreneur and author known for developing lean startup principles.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
description: An exploration of how the mind works and makes decisions, explaining biases and mental shortcuts.

author.biography: Daniel Kahneman is a psychologist and Nobel laureate known for his work in behavioral economics.

title: Becoming
description: A memoir by Michelle Obama, offering a deeply personal account of her life, from childhood to her time as the First Lady of the United States.

author.biography: Michelle Obama is a lawyer, writer, and former First Lady of the United States, known for her advocacy on education, health, and military families.

title: Deep Work
description: A guide to maximizing focus and productivity in an increasingly distracted world.

author.biography: Cal Newport is a computer science professor and author, known for his focus on productivity and digital minimalism.

title: How to Win Friends and Influence People
description: A classic guide to improving communication and building relationships.
cover: images/How to Win Friends and Influence People.jpg

author.biography: Dale Carnegie was an early self-improvement writer focused on interpersonal skills.

title: Start with Why
description: A book about how leaders inspire action by focusing on the 'why' behind their mission.

author.biography: Simon Sinek is a motivational speaker and author known for his concept of the 'Golden Circle.'

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
description: A personal finance book that contrasts different approaches to money and wealth.

author.biography: Robert Kiyosaki is an investor, entrepreneur, and author focused on financial education.

title: Atomic Habits
description: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones

author.biography: I’ve been writing at JamesClear.com about habits, decision making, and continuous improvement since 2012.

title: Think and Grow Rich
description: A personal development and self-help book by Napoleon Hill. It teaches how to achieve success and financial independence.

author.biography: Napoleon Hill was an American self-help author.

title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
description: A classic guide to personal and professional effectiveness.
cover: images/The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People.jpg

author.biography: Stephen Covey was a leadership and management expert whose work influenced millions worldwide.

title: The Power of Habit
description: A book that explains how habits work and how to change them.

author.biography: Charles Duhigg is a journalist and author specializing in business and behavioral science.

title: The Alchemist
description: A fable about following one’s dreams

author.biography: Paulo Coelho is a Brazilian author, best known for his novel 'The Alchemist,' which has been translated into many languages.

title: Dare to Lead
description: A book on leadership that explores vulnerability and courage as key factors in building successful teams.

author.biography: Brené Brown is a research professor at the University of Houston and an expert on leadership, vulnerability, and courage.

title: The 5 AM Club
description: A guide to waking up early and using the first hours of the day to maximize success and personal growth.

author.biography: Robin Sharma is a leadership speaker and author, known for his work on productivity and success.

title: The Compound Effect
description: This book reveals that small choices we make each day shape our future.

author.biography: Darren Hardy is a popular speaker on success and personal growth, sharing principles for achieving goals.

title: Mindset: The New Psychology of Success
description: A book on the difference between fixed and growth mindsets and how they affect achievement.

author.biography: Carol Dweck is a psychologist known for her research on motivation, personality, and development.

title: Grit: The Power of Passion and Perseverance
description: A book about the power of perseverance and dedication in achieving long-term goals.

author.biography: Angela Duckworth is a psychologist known for her research on grit and self-control.

title: The Millionaire Next Door
description: A book exploring the habits and traits of wealthy individuals.

author.biography: Thomas J. Stanley was an author and researcher on wealthy individuals.

title: Zero to One
description: A book about building startups, innovation, and creating something unique.

author.biography: Peter Thiel is a venture capitalist, entrepreneur, and co-founder of PayPal.

title: Leaders Eat Last
description: A book exploring how great leaders build trust and create successful teams.

author.biography: Simon Sinek is a motivational speaker and author known for his work on leadership and organizational behavior.
